author: David Paul
title: You could be able to see the Northern Lights in Texas for the next 3 nights
text: HOUSTON — As we get closer to the peak of our sun's 11-year solar cycle, solar flares, sun spots, prominences and coronal mass ejections become more likely. It's these coronal mass ejections (CME) that are famous for causing the [Aurora Borealis](/video/news/local/northern-lights-shine-over-texas-panhandle/285-4d1b5c62-6604-49cc-9225-bfb68e4b7b99) to erupt in the sky across our northern latitudes. Just a few days ago, on Oct. 8, our sun produced one of those CMEs -- a big one! This severe solar storm sent a cloud of plasma and charged particles racing directly toward our Earth. NOAA defines this one as a G4-level storm. That's only one level away from the most severe level of G5. The storm will arrive tonight, Oct. 10, and last through the first part of the weekend. It's the kind of geomagnetic storm that can do damage to communication satellites, GPS devices and other electronic infrastructure but also produce a tremendous display of the [Northern Lights](/video/news/local/northern-lights-shine-over-texas-panhandle/285-4d1b5c62-6604-49cc-9225-bfb68e4b7b99). Because of the strength of the storm, skywatchers will be able to see the show across a wider swath of the Northern Hemisphere than usual. That means people as far south as Texas should be able to witness the glow of the Northern Lights. The Northern Lights were visible in the northeast on Thursday night in places they're usually not able to be seen. Will we be able to see them in the Houston area? Well, probably not. Forecasters say you'll have to go to North Texas for the closest chance of catching the show. But folks as far south as Dallas to Wichita Falls to Amarillo have a real shot at seeing the Aurora for the next few nights through Saturday. Now, I personally witnessed the Northern Lights on a camping trip near San Marcos back in 1990. It appeared as a faint red glow in the northern night sky. Nothing spectacular, but it was there. Just knowing I was seeing the Northern Lights in Central Texas was amazing enough! So, if you can get far, far away from the city lights of the Greater Houston area, stay up late and keep an eye on the north. Skies will be very clear, the stars will be out, and you never know when Mother Nature will throw a surprise our way!

author: @AsianetNewsHN
title: अहमदाबाद विमान हादसे के बाद एयर इंडिया का बड़ा फैसला, अंतरराष्ट्रीय उड़ानों में 15% की कटौती करेगा एयरलाइन
text:
Air India Flight: अहमदाबाद हादसे के बाद एयर इंडिया ने बड़ा फैसला लिया है। फ्लाइट AI-171 की दुर्घटना के बाद एयरलाइन ने कहा है कि भविष्य की किसी भी आपात स्थिति से निपटने के लिए 15% अंतरराष्ट्रीय उड़ानों में कटौती की जाएगी।
Air India Flight: अहमदाबाद में हादसे के बाद एयर इंडिया ने बड़ा कदम उठाया है। एयरलाइन ने अपने बयान में कहा है कि यह फैसला इसलिए लिया गया है ताकि जरूरत पड़ने पर अचानक आने वाली किसी भी स्थिति से निपटने के लिए अतिरिक्त विमान तैयार रखे जा सकें। यह कदम उस दुखद हादसे के बाद उठाया गया है, जिसमें फ्लाइट AI-171 के दुर्घटनाग्रस्त होने से 241 यात्रियों और क्रू मेंबर्स की जान चली गई थी।
अंतरराष्ट्रीय उड़ानों में 15% की कटौती
एयर इंडिया ने अपने बयान में कहा है कि यह निर्णय भविष्य में किसी भी आपात स्थिति से निपटने और रिजर्व विमानों की उपलब्धता सुनिश्चित करने के लिए लिया गया है। यह कदम फ्लाइट AI-171 की दुखद दुर्घटना के बाद उठाया गया है जिसमें 241 यात्रियों और क्रू सदस्यों की मौत हो गई थी।
यात्रियों की सुविधा का रखा गया ध्यान
एयर इंडिया ने कहा है कि जिन यात्रियों की उड़ानें रद्द होंगी, उन्हें समय पर जानकारी दी जाएगी। उनकी यात्रा के लिए दूसरी उड़ानों में जगह देने की पूरी कोशिश की जाएगी। यात्री चाहें तो अपनी यात्रा बिना कोई एक्स्ट्रा चार्ज दिए दोबारा बुक कर सकते हैं या फिर पूरा पैसा वापस ले सकते हैं। 20 जून से जो नया अंतरराष्ट्रीय उड़ानों का शेड्यूल लागू होगा, वह भी जल्दी ही बताया जाएगा।
यह भी पढ़ें: ONGC घोटाला: CBI ने 10 लोगों पर दर्ज किया केस, 45 लाख की धोखाधड़ी का आरोप
विमानों की सुरक्षा जांच जारी
नागर विमानन महानिदेशालय ने एयर इंडिया के बोइंग 787-8 और 787-9 विमानों पर उन्नत सुरक्षा जांच अनिवार्य कर दी है। अब तक 33 में से 26 विमानों की जांच पूरी हो चुकी है और उन्हें सेवा के लिए हरी झंडी मिल चुकी है। बाकी विमानों की जांच भी जल्द पूरी की जाएगी। साथ ही, बोइंग 777 विमानों की अतिरिक्त सुरक्षा जांच भी की जा रही है।
सरकार और एजेंसियों के साथ मिलकर राहत प्रयास
एयर इंडिया ने बताया कि गुजरात सरकार और नागरिक उड्डयन मंत्रालय की मदद से हादसे में मारे गए लोगों के परिवारों और घायलों को हर तरह की सहायता दी जा रही है। एयरलाइन ने यह भी कहा कि उड़ानों में कटौती का फैसला इसलिए लिया गया है ताकि कामकाज को सुचारु रखा जा सके, यात्रियों को परेशानी न हो और सेवाओं की गुणवत्ता बेहतर बनाई जा सके।
topics: Economy, Business and Finance->business strategy and marketing

author: Reuters
title: Mark Zuckerberg's Meta targets ChatGPT with plans to release standalone AI app: report - NewsBreak
text: Meta Platforms plans to debut a standalone Meta AI app to join Facebook and Instagram during the second quarter, CNBC reported Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter. The move marks a major step in Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg’s plans to make Meta the leader in AI by the end of the year, ahead of competitors like OpenAI and Alphabet, CNBC reported. Meta apologizes after Instagram users are flooded with violent videos FCC Chair Brendan Carr taking first steps in eroding key legal protection enjoyed by Big Tech CLICK HERE TO SIGN UP FOR OUR MORNING REPORT NEWSLETTER Meta did not immediately respond to a Reuters request for comment. Last month, Zuckerberg said that the company plans to spend as much as $65 billion this year to expand its AI infrastructure. For top headlines, breaking news and more, visit nypost.com.

author: Katrina Markel
title: Iowa lawmaker says proposed Medicaid cuts will hurt most vulnerable - NewsBreak
text: Will proposed cuts to Medicaid hurt Iowans who need it? State Representative Josh Turek says the cuts will hit vulnerable Iowans as well as hospitals and nursing homes. Proponents of the bill point to a $50 billion rural hospital fund. WATCH KATRINA'S STORY BELOW STATEMENT FROM HEARTLAND FAMILY SERVICE “At Heartland Family Service, 82% of our clients make less than $25,000 per year (2023 data). Therefore, Medicaid is essential for many of our clients to be able to access behavioral health services with HFS and physical health services elsewhere. We oppose limiting that access to care because we know how important and life-saving Medicaid can be.” RELATED | Medicaid cuts loom as senate prepares to vote on federal budget bill BROADCAST TRANSCRIPT: I'm Southwest Iowa neighborhood reporter Katrina Markel in Council Bluffs. Half of Iowa Medicaid recipients work full-time; others are permanently disabled adults. Many are children, and there are worries that cuts to that health insurance program could hurt some of the state's most vulnerable citizens. Rep. Josh Turek: "It's a horrific bill, and every single American should be appalled." State Representative Josh Turek uses a wheelchair and has been advocating for changes to Iowa's Medicaid system for years. He was just in Washington D.C. talking to members of Congress about proposed cuts to Medicaid. "And you're doing all of this to be able to cut the taxes for people that make more than $550,000 a year," he said. According to the Kaiser Family Foundation — a large healthcare nonprofit — 600,000 Iowans are on Medicaid, and at least 86,000 Iowans would lose healthcare under the proposed budget cuts. House Majority Leader Steve Scalise said on Wednesday that only able-bodied adults will be removed from Medicaid: "...the fully able-bodied, who are sitting on Medicaid, turning down work. They're going to be going to get work, but they're also going to be getting private insurance, which is better for hospitals than Medicaid." Turek points to the large percentage of people on Medicaid who are already working but qualify because they have low income. He's also worried about rural healthcare. "Over the last five years, we've already lost 31 nursing homes and skilled nursing facilities," he said. "So we’re already talking about a system that is underfunded — with critical shortages oftentimes — and we're talking about making significant cuts to that. It's fundamentally wrong." Proponents of the bill point to a $50 billion rural hospital fund. In a statement, a spokesperson for Sen. Joni Ernst told me: "Senator Ernst will continue to stand up for Iowa's rural hospitals, clinics, and community health centers that serve our state." "We know what's going to end up happening. It's going to be fewer people that are eligible, it's going to be fewer services, fewer providers, and it's going to be longer wait lists," said Turek.

author: Presstv
title: US imposes sanctions on Yemen after military threat falls flat
text: The US has targeted a number of individuals and entities for allegedly helping the flow of financial assistance to Yemen after failing to build a coalition against the country and deter it with military threats. Yemen has lately come on the US radar for hostile measures after seeing the country's armed forces intercept or target Israeli ships or vessels bound for Israeli ports in the Red Sea in a bid to deter Tel Aviv from its ongoing genocide in Gaza. According to a US Treasury statement released on Thursday, the head of the Currency Exchangers Association in Sana’a and three exchange houses in Yemen and Turkey are designated for sanctions. Those targeted were responsible for "facilitating the flow of financial assistance" to Yemen's National Salvation Government and the country's Ansarullah movement, it said. The sanctions freeze any US assets belonging to the targeted entities and generally prohibit Americans from doing business with them. Under Secretary of the Treasury for Terrorism and Financial Intelligence Brian E. Nelson accused Ansarullah of conducting dangerous attacks on international shipping and destabilizing the region. “The United States, along with our allies and partners, will continue to target the key facilitation networks that enable the destabilizing activities" of Ansarullah, it added. In recent weeks, a series of seaborne strikes attributed to the Yemeni forces have been conducted in solidarity with the Palestinians in the besieged Gaza Strip. Yemen has already warned it will prevent the passage of all ships in the Red Sea bound to the occupied territories. The Bab el-Mandeb Strait is a crucial waterway between Yemen and northeast Africa leading to the Red Sea, up to the Suez Canal and the Israeli port of Eilat. An estimated $1 trillion in goods pass through the strait annually. The European Union earlier agreed to contribute to a US-led coalition against Yemeni armed forces. But in a major setback, France, Spain, and Italy later officially withdrew their participation from the controversial alliance. The three nations have explicitly stated their commitment to operating exclusively under the command of international bodies such as the United Nations, NATO, or the European Union, choosing not to align with the United States. The leader of Ansarullah recently said Yemen's armed forces will not hesitate to target US military warships in the Red Sea if Washington and its allies carry out military strikes against Yemen. Yemenis have declared their open support for Palestine’s struggle against the Israeli occupation since Tel Aviv launched a devastating war on Gaza on October 7 after Palestinian resistance movements carried out a surprise retaliatory attack, dubbed Operation Al-Aqsa Storm. Palestinian resistance movement Hamas has said Yemeni strikes against ships heading to Israel send a message to the West that they should stop the ongoing carnage or expect the crisis to expand across the region. author: Valley City Times-Record
title: Medical Answering Service AI Paves the Path for Enhanced Healthcare Sector | User | times-online.com
text: Amidst the ongoing digital revolution and the escalating prevalence of online presence, there is a notable surge in the demand for medical answering services. This surge has opened up new prospects for call service providers. However, the market is now saturated with subpar solutions, prompting healthcare professionals to seek a dependable medical practice answering service. Since its establishment in 1991, Medical Answering Services AI has been a trailblazer in the industry, consistently adapting to the evolving needs of healthcare practices. With over three decades of experience, it proudly introduces an innovative approach to medical call management designed to streamline operations, enhance patient care, and elevate communication standards within the healthcare sector. This groundbreaking service will reshape how healthcare providers engage with their patients, blending extensive experience with cutting-edge technology for a more efficient and promising future. In our recent discussion with the team, we will delve into their recent successes and explore valuable lessons that other companies can extract from their journey. Establishing Confidence: 14-Day Trial Period Understanding the critical importance of trust in healthcare services, the company emphasizes its commitment to excellence through a complimentary 14-day trial period. This trial serves as a concrete expression of the company's dedication to transparency and quality, providing medical practitioners with a firsthand experience of the positive impact of its services on their daily operations. The company aims to build trust with potential clients by offering this opportunity, showcasing efficacy and reliability. Established Reputation Since 1991 With a rich history dating back to 1991, the company has become a trusted nationwide medical practice answering service. Over the years, it has continuously adjusted to the evolving needs of the healthcare industry, positioning itself as a reliable and forward-thinking service provider. By staying abreast of industry developments, the company endeavors to provide its clients with top-notch service, nurturing lasting relationships founded on trust, reliability, and a shared dedication to advancing patient care. Emphasizing Clarity through Affordable Solutions A fundamental aspect of their mission is prioritizing transparency and accessibility in healthcare solutions. This commitment is demonstrated through their cost-effective offering – a medical answering service available at a flat monthly rate of only $69. This budget-friendly solution enables healthcare practitioners of all sizes to provide uninterrupted patient care without burdening their finances. The steadfast commitment to transparency ensures clients receive a valuable service without hidden costs or unexpected financial surprises. Dependable Support Around the Clock Recognizing the constant demands of the healthcare sector, the company functions as a 24/7 medical call center. This persistent service structure empowers them to address patient inquiries, manage appointment scheduling, and respond to emergency calls at any hour. This unwavering dedication to around-the-clock availability guarantees that your patients receive timely care, significantly enhancing healthcare delivery's efficiency and reliability. Assisting a Wide Spectrum of Healthcare Fields Acknowledging the multifaceted nature of healthcare, the company tailors its services to address the distinctive requirements of individual healthcare facilities. This customized approach guarantees a smooth and continuous patient experience for diverse healthcare professionals, from hospitals and pediatricians to OBGYNs, dentists, mental health practitioners, hospices, and specialists. By accommodating the unique needs of each sector, the company enhances the overall effectiveness and efficiency of healthcare delivery. Providing Precision through Accurate Call Routing Efficient triaging of incoming calls is important in healthcare operations. The system adeptly differentiates between urgent and non-urgent calls, prioritizing immediate attention for critical issues and appropriately handling non-emergent matters. This precise call routing minimizes unnecessary disruptions for medical staff, streamlining communication and enhancing the overall effectiveness of healthcare services. Ensuring Patient Privacy through a HIPAA-Compliant Strategy Medical Answering Service AI safeguards patient privacy and upholds data security. The company takes pride in providing a reliable medical practice answering service that adheres to HIPAA compliance, underscoring its dedication to this responsibility. This compliance guarantees the utmost security standards in handling sensitive patient information, creating an atmosphere of trust and confidence. Selecting the appropriate medical answering service is vital to ensure the seamless functioning of your medical practice. "The medical answering service we provide is 100% HIPAA compliant and completely secure. Our secure messaging service lets you and your patients rest easy, knowing that patient information remains safe. Ensuring all your systems and staff communication procedures are HIPAA compliant is key." author: Kunal Khullar
title: Nvidia warns gamers of an incoming GPU shortage | Digital Trends
text:
Get ready for yet another GPU shortage, as Nvidia has warned about potential shortages in the current quarter. Although the company’s third-quarter revenue saw a healthy growth, in its recent earnings call , company Chief Financial Officer Colette Kress said that the fourth-quarter revenue is expected to decline sequentially due to supply constraints.
The anticipated GPU shortage could potentially stem from a strategic shift in production to prepare for the next-generation RTX 50-series “Blackwell” GPUs, slated for release in 2025. This supply transition, coupled with surging gaming and professional use-case demand, seems to have left the company in a tight spot. Nvidia acknowledged its struggle to maintain stock for both gamers and enterprise customers, emphasizing its ongoing efforts to expand manufacturing capacity.
Recommended Videos For gamers, this warning means longer wait times and potential price surges for Nvidia’s GPUs during the holiday season. Retailers may face limited inventory of RTX 40-series models, especially premium cards like the RTX 4080 and RTX 4090 . This challenge arrives as gamers increasingly seek powerful hardware for 4K gaming and emerging AI-enhanced features, making GPU availability crucial.
Get your weekly teardown of the tech behind PC gaming ReSpec Subscribe Check your inbox! Privacy Policy Nvidia remains optimistic about a recovery though, projecting improved supply by early 2025 as production ramps up. Analysts note that the company’s dual strategy — balancing gaming and enterprise segments — has proven profitable but may exacerbate short-term shortages. Additionally, the ramp-up to the RTX 50-series could generate renewed interest among gamers, potentially easing pressure on older product lines.
Related The hype is real: Nvidia finally teases the RTX 50-series Indiana Jones and the Great Circle proves Nvidia wrong about 8GB GPUs Nvidia may have found a new way to bypass GPU export restrictions Despite these challenges, Nvidia continues to solidify its leadership in both gaming and AI markets. The company’s GPUs remain a cornerstone of the gaming ecosystem and the driving force behind advancements in generative AI technologies. However, gamers should brace for a challenging quarter in obtaining sought-after GPUs until supply levels stabilize.
On the positive side, Nvidia’s third-quarter revenue surged 94% year-over-year to $35 billion, with net income rising 109% to $19.3 billion. The data center segment drove this growth, contributing $30.7 billion (87.7% of total revenue), fueled by strong demand for H100/H200 and upcoming Blackwell GPUs.

author: 全民健康网
title: 江岸区儿童早矫低至3280元！良依/齐禾/海峡明朗早矫价格全公开！
text:
江岸区儿童早矫低至3280元！良依/齐禾/海峡明朗早矫价格全公开！
http://kouqiang.qm120.com2025-06-12 15:31:36 来源：全民健康网
在武汉江岸区，儿童早期矫正已成为众多家长关注的焦点。随着人们对口腔健康重视程度的提升，良依、齐禾、海峡明朗三家机构凭借差异化的定价策略和技术特色，成为家长们的热门选择。本文结合2025年新报价、矫正技术及服务细节，深度解析三家机构的性价比差异，助您为孩子选择更合适的早矫方案。
良依口腔以3280元起的儿童JPF肌功能矫治器价格占据市场低位，适合乳牙期牙弓狭窄、吮指等习惯矫正。其矫治器采用食品级硅胶材质，夜间佩戴舒适度高，且赠送家庭护理套装，包含咬合训练器及清洁工具。齐禾口腔的早期干预价格跨度较大，传统金属托槽矫正9000元起，罗慕咬合诱导矫正器8000元起，而隐形矫正则高达25000元起，适合对美观要求较高的家庭。海峡明朗虽未明确标注基础款价格，但根据其邻价机构推测，早期干预矫正费用约在4800-8800元区间，且提供智能化咬合分析服务，准度更高。
良依的JPF矫治器主打功能性调整，针对3-12岁儿童常见的深覆合、反颌问题，通过引导下颌前移改善面型。其特色在于可拆卸设计，家长可协助孩子进行日常清洁，降低龋齿风险。齐禾的罗慕咬合诱导矫正器则侧重牙弓形态塑造，采用夜间佩戴模式，不影响白天活动，尤其适合牙列拥挤的儿童。海峡明朗引入AI智能化矫正系统，通过3D扫描生成个性化矫正方案，对骨性错颌畸形的干预结果更显著，且支持多期付款，缓解家庭经济压力。
三家机构均配备经验充足的儿童正畸医生。良依的张红霞医生深耕儿牙领域15年，擅长处理乳牙早失导致的间隙管理问题。齐禾的匡医生主攻隐形矫正力学设计，发表多篇儿童早矫相关论文。海峡明朗的医生团队均来自综合医院，尤其擅长复杂病例的联合治疗，如同时矫正牙齿不齐与颌骨发育异常。
建议家长优先预约免费检查，通过智能化模拟预判矫正结果。实地体验服务流程后再做决定。
编辑：李彤彤

author: @gurufocus
title: ROLLINS, INC. REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2025 FINANCIAL RESULTS | ROL Stock News
text:
- Rollins (
ROL,Financial) reported Q1 2025 revenues of $823 million, a 9.9% YoY increase driven by 7.4% organic growth. - Net income rose by 11.5% to $105 million, while EPS increased by 15.8% to $0.22 per diluted share.
- Operating cash flow surged 15.3% to $147 million, aided by the strategic Saela acquisition.
Rollins, Inc. (ROL) has reported robust financial results for the first quarter of 2025, highlighting a solid start to the year. The company's revenues rose to $823 million, marking a 9.9% increase compared to the same period last year, with organic growth contributing 7.4% of this increase. Despite the negative impact of a stronger dollar reducing revenues by 40 basis points, Rollins maintained impressive growth figures.
The company's net income reached $105 million, up 11.5% year-over-year, while earnings per share (EPS) saw a notable rise of 15.8%, settling at $0.22 per diluted share. Additionally, Rollins showcased its financial strength with operating cash flow climbing 15.3% to $147 million.
Rollins' strategic focus on mergers and acquisitions, including the recent acquisition of Saela Holdings, LLC in April, played a significant role in its expansion strategy. This acquisition underscores Rollins' commitment to integrating new businesses and enhancing its service offerings amidst favorable market conditions.
Despite these achievements, Rollins experienced a minor contraction in its operating margin, which decreased by 40 basis points to 17.3%, partly due to increased fleet expenses and other operational costs. Nonetheless, the company's strategic investments and robust organic growth continue to bolster its market position and future outlook.
The financial results for Q1 2025 hint at a strong year ahead for Rollins, as the company continues to capitalize on its diverse portfolio and the expansion of its business through strategic acquisitions.
